workflow.title: StRAnGER Web Service Workflow
workflow.description: StRAnGER is a web-based application, which performs functional analysis of high-throughput genomic datasets, starting from a list of significant genes derived from statistical and empirical thresholds, by utilizing the GO database and the KEGG pathway database as well as established statistical methods in order to relate the identified significant genes with important nodes in the GO tree structure or map those genes to over-represented metabolic pathways.
